= Vtk programming in omegalib =
<p>*Last revision:* ver. 2.1 - 27 June 2012</p>

On this page you will learn how to put together a basic omegalib application to render a visualization toolkit pipeline. [www.vtk.org The visualization toolkit (vtk)] is a standard open source framework for scientific and information visualization. If you have never heard of it yo can probably skip this page, unless you want to get some additional information on the inner workings of omegalib.
